task_description:
# Complete Temporal Analysis Engine

Implement the temporal analysis engine to extract, normalize, and analyze dates and time references across documents. Detect temporal inconsistencies, anachronisms, and suspicious timing patterns.

## Rationale
Institutional misconduct often involves backdated documents, impossible timelines, and events that couldn't have occurred in the stated sequence. This is a core contradiction type that no competitor addresses systematically. General AI assistants lack the persistent context to track temporal patterns (pain-4-1).

## User Stories
- As an investigative journalist, I want to automatically detect when a document claims to have been written before events it references so that I can expose backdating
- As a legal professional, I want to see a timeline of all events across my case documents so that I can identify impossible sequences

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Engine extracts dates from documents with 95%+ accuracy
- [ ] Relative dates ('three weeks later') converted to absolute where anchor exists
- [ ] Temporal impossibilities flagged automatically
- [ ] Integration with timeline visualization in Phase 2
